Verses: 1  neengal Enakku Ezhudhina Kaariyangalaikkuriththu Naan Ezhudhugiradhennavendraal, Sthireeyaith Thodaamalirukkiradhu Manushanukku Nalladhu.
2  aagilum Vesiththanam Iraadhapadikku Avanavan Than Sondha Manaiviyaiyum, Avalaval Than Sondhap Purushanaiyum Udaiyavargalaayirukkavendum.
3  purushan Than Manaivikku Seyyavendiya Kadamaiyai Seyyakkadavan; Appadiye Manaiviyum Than Purushanukku Seyyakkadaval.
4  manaiviyaanaval Than Suyasareeraththirku Adhigaariyalla, Purushane Adharku Adhigaari; Appadiye Purushanum Than Suyasareeraththirku Adhigaariyalla, Manaiviye Adharku Adhigaari.

5  ubavaasaththirkum Jebaththirkum Thadaiyiraadhapadikku Iruvarum Silakaalam Pirindhirukkavendumendru Sammadhiththaalandri, Oruvaraivittu Oruvar Piriyaadhirungal; Ungalukku Viradhaththuvam Illaamaiyaal Saaththaan Ungalaith Thoondividaadhapadikku, Marupadiyum Koodi Vaazhungal.
6  idhai Naan Kattalaiyaaga Sollaamal, Yosanaiyaaga Sollugiren.

7  ellaa Manusharum Ennaippolave Irukka Virumbugiren. Aagilum Avanavanukku Dhevanaal Arulappatta Avanavanukkuriya Varamundu; Adhu Oruvanukku Oruvidhamaayum, Matroruvanukku Veruvidhamaayum Irukkiradhu.
8  vivaagamillaadhavargalaiyum, Kaimpengalaiyumkuriththu Naan Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Avargal Ennaippola Irundhuvittaal Avargalukku Nalamaayirukkum.
9  aagilum Avargal Viraththaraayirukkakkoodaadhirundhaal Vivaagampannakkadavargal; Vegiradhaippaarkkilum Vivaagampannugiradhu Nalam.
10  vivaagampannikkondavargalukku Naanalla, Karththare Kattalaiyidugiradhaavadhu: Manaiviyaanaval Than Purushanai Vittup Pirindhupogakkoodaadhu.
11  pirindhuponaal Aval Vivaagamillaadhirukkakkadaval, Alladhu Purushanode Oppuravaagakkadaval; Purushanum Than Manaiviyaith Thallividakkoodaadhu.

12  matravargalaikkuriththuk Karththar Alla, Naane Sollugiradhaavadhu: Sagodharanoruvanudaiya Manaivi Avisuvaasiyaayirundhum, Avanudane Vaasamaayirukka Avalukku Sammadhamirundhaal, Avan Avalaith Thallividaadhirukkakkadavan.
13  appadiye Oru Sthireeyinudaiya Purushan Avisuvaasiyaayirundhum, Avaludane Vaasamaayirukka Avanukku Sammadhamirundhaal, Aval Avanaith Thallividaadhirukkakkadaval.

14  ennaththinaalenil, Avisuvaasiyaana Purushan Than Manaiviyaal Parisuththamaakkappadugiraan; Avisuvaasiyaana Manaiviyum Than Purushanaal Parisuththamaakkappadugiraal. Illaavittaal Ungal Pillaigal Asuththamaayirukkume; Ippozhudho Avaigal Parisuththamaayirukkindrana.

15  aagilum, Avisuvaasi Pirindhuponaal Pirindhupogattum, Ippadippatta Vishayaththil, Sagodharanaavadhu Sagodhariyaavadhu Adimaippattavargalalla. Samaadhaanamaayirukkumpadikke Dhevan Nammai Azhaiththirukkiraar.
16  manaiviyaanavale, Nee Un Purushanai Ratchippaayo Allavo Unakku Eppadith Theriyum? Purushane, Nee Un Manaiviyai Ratchippaayo Allavo Unakku Eppadith Theriyum?
17  dhevan Avanavanukkup Pagirndhadheppadiyo, Karththar Avanavanai Azhaiththadheppadiyo, Appadiye Avanavan Nadakkakkadavan. Ellaa Sabaigalileyum Ippadiye Thittampannugiren.

18  oruvan Viruththasedhanam Petravanaai Azhaikkappattirundhaal, Viruththasedhanamillaadhavanaayirukka Vagaidhedaanaaga; Oruvan Viruththasedhanamillaadhavanaai Azhaikkappattirundhaal, Viruththasedhanamperaadhiruppaanaaga.
19  viruththasedhanamum Ondrumillai, Viruththasedhanamillaamaiyum Ondrumillai; Dhevanudaiya Karpanaigalaik Kaikkollugiradhe Kaariyam.
20  avanavan Thaan Azhaikkappatta Nilaimaiyile Nilaiththirukkakkadavan.
21  adimaiyaai Nee Azhaikkappattirundhaal, Kavalaippadaadhe; Nee Suyaadheenanaagakkoodumaanaal Adhai Nalamendru Anusariththukkol.
22  karththarukkul Azhaikkappatta Adimaiyaanavan Karththarudaiyasuyaadheenanaayirukkiraan; Appadiye Azhaikkappatta Suyaadheenan Kiristhuvinudaiya Adimaiyaayirukkiraan.
23  neengal Kirayaththukku Kollappatteergal; Manusharukku Adimaigalaagaadhirungal.
24  sagodharare, Avanavan Thaan Azhaikkappatta Nilaimaiyile Dhevanukku Munbaaga Nilaiththirukkakkadavan.
25  andriyum Kannigaigalaikkuriththu, Karththaraal Enakkuk Kattalai Illai. Aagilum Naan Unmaiyullavanaayirukkiradharkuk Karththaraal Irakkampetru En Abippiraayaththaith Theriyappaduththugiren.
26  adhennavenil Ippozhudhu Undaayirukkira Thunbaththinimiththam Vivaagamillaamalirukkiradhu Manushanukku Nalamaayirukkumendru Ennugiren.
27  nee Manaiviyode Kattappattirundhaal, Avizhkkappada Vagaithedaadhe; Nee Manaivi Illaadhavanaayirundhaal Manaiviyaith Thedaadhe.
28  nee Vivaagampanninaalum Paavamalla, Kannigai Vivaagampanninaalum Paavamalla. Aagilum Appadippattavargal Sareeraththile Ubaththiravappaduvaargal; Adharku Neengal Thappavendumendrirukkiren.
29  melum, Sagodharare, Naan Sollugiradhennavenil, Inivarum Kaalam Kuruginadhaanapadiyaal, Manaivigalullavargal Manaivigalillaadhavargalpolavum,
30  azhugiravargal Azhaadhavargalpolavum, Santhoshappadugiravargal Santhoshappadaadhavargalpolavum, Kollugiravargal Kollaadhavargalpolavum,
31  ivvulagaththai Anubavikkiravargal Adhai Thagaadhavidhamaai Anubaviyaadhavargalpolavum Irukkavendum; Ivvulagaththin Vesham Kadandhupogiradhe.
32  neengal Kavalaiyatravargalaayirukka Virumbugiren. Vivaagamillaadhavan Karththarukkueppadip Piriyamaayirukkalaamendru, Karththarukkuriyavaigalukkaagak Kavalaippadugiraan
33  vivaagampanninavan Than Manaivikku Eppadip Piriyamaayirukkalaamendru, Ulagaththirkuriyavaigalukkaagak Kavalaippadugiraan

34  adhupola, Manaiviyaanavalukkum Kannigaikkum Viththiyaasamundu. Vivaagamillaadhaval Sareeraththilum Aaththumaavilum Parisuththamaayirukkumpadikarththarukkuriyavaigalukkaagak Kavalaippadugiraal; Vivaagampanninaval Than Purushanukku Eppadip Piriyamaayirukkalaamendru, Ulagaththirkuriyavailukkaagak Kavalaippadugiraal.

35  idhai Naan Ungalaik Kanniyil Agappaduththavendumendru Sollaamal, Ungalukkuth Thagudhiyaayirukkumendrum, Neengal Kavalaiyillaamal Karththaraippatrikkondirukkavendumendrum, Ungal Suyapirayojanaththukkaagave Sollugiren.

36  aagilum Oruvan Than Puththiriyin Kannigaipparuvam Kadandhuponadhinaale, Aval Vivaagam Pannaamaliruppadhu Avalukkuth Thagudhiyallavendrum, Aval Vivaagampannuvadhu Avasiyamendrum Ninaiththaal, Avan Than Manadhinpadi Seyyakkadavan; Adhu Paavamalla, Vivaagampannattum.

37  aayinum Adharku Avasiyaththaikkaanaamal, Than Irudhayaththile Urudhiyullavanaayum, Suyasiththaththinpadi Seyya Adhigaaramullavanaayumirundhu, Than Puththiriyin Kannipparuvaththaik Kaakkavendumendru Than Irudhayaththil Theermaanikkiravan Nanmaiseygiraan.
38  ippadiyirukka, Avalai Vivaagampannik Kodukkiravanum Nanmaiseygiraan; Kodaamalirukkiravanum Adhiga Nanmaiseygiraan.

39  manaiviyaanaval Than Purushan Uyirodirukkunkaalamalavum Piramaanaththinaal Kattappattirukkiraal; Than Purushan Mariththapinbu Thanakku Ishtamaanavanaayumkarththarukkutpattavanaayumirukkira Evanaiyaagilum Vivaagampannikkolla Vidudhalaiyaayirukkiraal.
40  aagilum Ennudaiya Abippiraayaththinpadi Aval Appadiye Irundhuvittaal Baakkiyavadhiyaayiruppaal. Ennidaththilum Dhevanudaiya Aavi Undendru Ennugiren.
